# üöÄ Tdevs ‚Äì Termux X11 Desktop Installer

A **one-command installer** to run a full **XFCE desktop environment** on Android using **Termux + Termux:X11**.

> Clean ‚Ä¢ Native ‚Ä¢ No Proot ‚Ä¢ No VNC

---

## ‚ú® Features

- üñ• XFCE4 Desktop (native Termux)
- ‚ö° Termux:X11 (low latency, smooth)
- üîä PulseAudio support
- üåê Browser choice (Firefox / Chromium)
- üßë Personalized desktop greeting
- üíª Optional VS Code (code-server)
- üßπ One-click uninstall
- üé® Clean UI with progress indicators

## üì¶ Requirements

- ‚úÖ **Termux from F-Droid**
- ‚úÖ **Termux:X11 app installed**
- ‚ùå Play Store Termux is NOT supported

---

## üõ† Installation

```bash
pkg install git
git clone https://github.com/TechTern/Tdevs-Termux-X11
cd Tdevs-Termux-X11
chmod +x install-tx11-desktop.sh
./install-tx11-desktop.sh
